price: Əgər Allahın nemətlərini sayacaq olsanız, onları sayıb qurtara bilməzsiniz. Həqiqətən, Allah Bağışlayandır, Rəhmlidir.
arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-laha laghafūrun raḥīmun
